title: Ip boost from oil viewing party
body:
Hey guys what ever happened to the 3 win ip boost that you got for going to the viewing advent 
I never recived it

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you purchased your tickets for the Hoyts viewing event online you should've received your IP boost code via email.

If you purchased your tickets in person on the day of the event then you do not receive the boost, sorry about that.
